tag_list: lee-brown, hasoffers, affiliate-tracking, tracking-technology, hasoffers-cto, hasoffers-technology
overview: Lee plays the dominant role in programming and technology development of HasOffers. He has an extensive list of programming experience with core competencies in PHP and basic C programming. His contributions to programming communities played a key role in the development of a shared memory object for Apache. As CTO of HasOffers, Lee directs research and development as well as product management, focusing his efforts on the technical vision of HasOffers. Lee graduated magna cum laude from Babson College with a concentration in Finance and Information Systems.
